jgame

Class GParallax

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.GObject
      • jgame.GContainer
        • jgame.GParallax
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GAnimatable, GObjectHolder, GPaintable

    public class GParallax
extends GContainer
    A parallax layer pane. This component holds multiple layers of sprites that can glide back and forth, automatically looping.
    Author:
    William Chargin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  GParallax.GTiledSprite
      A tiled sprite container that facilitates autotile scroloing.

      • scrollLayerAt

        public void scrollLayerAt(int index,
                          double vx,
                          double vy)
        Sets the given layer's scrolling speed.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the layer to scroll
        vx - the velocity at which to scroll the layer in the x-direction
